name: TrashRPG
description:
TrashRPG is a short lil JRPG about a young boy doing chores for his mother.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
Z to interact
X to cancel menu selection
Alt+F4 to exit

While this is a fully playable build, the game still has a handful of bugs and issues! A couple of known ones are:
- Items don't work
- Running from battle doesn't work
